products.name: Rainbow Bright Tennis Qolbağı
products.description: Nəzərə alın ki, bütün daşlar unikaldır və rənglər bir qədər fərqli olacaq

products.name: Üç brilyant boyunbağı
products.description: 3x 2 mm yuvarlaq ağ brilyantlar. Ağ almaz: 0,15 ct. Əl ilə seçilmiş çox yaxşı kəsilmiş GH/SI-dən I almazlara. Bərk 14k qızıl çərçivə qəbulu. Ağ qızıl parçaları rodiumla örtülmüşdür. Bərk 14k qızıl zəncir və qapaq

products.name: Pastel Butterfly Studs
products.description: 10K Solid Sarı Qızıl.Dairəvi Çəhrayı Safir.Markiz Tanzaniti kəsdi.Nəzərə alın ki, hər sırğa unikaldır və daş rəngləri bir qədər fərqli olacaq.Cüt olaraq satılır

products.name: Çəhrayı Güclü Açıq Dairə Üzük
products.description: 10k bərk sarı qızıl.Marquise yaqut.Şahzadə yaqut.Baget yaqut.Dəyirmi rhodolit.Dəyirmi çəhrayı sapfir.Qeyd edək ki, bütün daşlar unikaldır və rəngləri bir qədər fərqli olacaq.

products.name: Rainbow Bright Tennis Boyunbağı
products.description: Nəzərə alın ki, bütün daşlar unikaldır və rənglər bir qədər fərqli olacaq

products.name: Kiçik Qızıl Huggie Clicker Sırğa
products.description: 14k bütöv sarı qızıl.13mm Xarici diametri.10mm Daxili diametri.Menteşeli qapalı.Tək sırğa kimi satılır.

products.name: Mini Pinky Signet Üzüyü
products.description: 10K bərk sarı qızıl.6.9mm x 5.7mm Üz.1.3mm bant genişliyi.Oyma Şrifti: Kursiv üslubu - Yalnız böyük hərf və fərdiləşdirmə yoxdur. 'YOX' seçilərsə, heç bir oyma daxil edilməyəcək. Həkk olunubsa, bu məhsul son məhsuldur. satılır və geri qaytarılmır.

products.name: Böyük Pave Pis Göz Boyunbağı
products.description: 10K Solid Sarı Qızıl.10mm Kulon.1.1mm Kullonun qalınlığı.16mm Zəncir uzunluğu. Kulon zəncir üzərində hərəkət edir.

products.name: Le Bleu Aypara Boyunbağı
products.description: 10K Solid Sarı Qızıl.10mm Kulon.1.1mm Kullonun qalınlığı.16mm Zəncir uzunluğu. Kulon zəncir üzərində hərəkət edir.

products.name: Only The Finest Tennis Qolbaq
products.description: A beautifully light and precious 14kt gold bracelet with a pear diamond drop. An Akoya pearl floats on the chain to add to the minimalist design.

products.name: Brilyant Kəpənək Kulonu
products.description: Heart Stone Drop Earrings

products.name: Kiçik içi boş halqa sırğalar
products.description: 14K bərk qızıl. Xarici diametri: 15mm. Daxili diametri: 9.5mm.3mm qalın.

products.name: Rainbow Huggie-nin üstündəki ikinci çuxur
products.description: This 14kt gold and diamond bangle is striking modernity with a freshwater pearl offset from the diamonds. A hinged clasp makes it easy to wear.

products.name: Sidecross Diamond Necklace
products.description: This 14kt gold side cross necklace defined her style and vision when she first began designing jewelry. Her proportions and look have inspired many yet it is always most gratifying to own the original. With this piece she adds a diamond on both sides of the cross allowing to flip and always be seen. That attention to detail is what sets Mizuki apart.

products.name: Pearl Diamond Ring
products.description: This 14kt gold ring perfectly balances a freshwater pearl against the single row of diamonds.

products.name: Medium Ballchain with Two Row Diamond Slider Necklace
products.description: A 14kt gold medium ballchain necklace with a two row diamond slider. A cool modern look.

products.name: Multi Pearl Drop Bracelet
products.description: Drop shaped Akoya pearls drop from the 14kt gold chain. They effortlessly move as you do. Perfect for any outfit.

products.name: Small Diamond Ear Cuff
products.description: Modern and timeless style. This 14kt gold diamond ear cuff could not say it better. Sold as a single.

products.name: Pear Diamond with Pearl Drop Bracelet
products.description: Elevate your look with beautiful precious gems from the Luxe collection. 14kt gold chain with a fancy cut pear shaped diamond. An Akoya pearl drops from the clasp for a touch only Meliora creates. Precious and refined for everyday.

products.name: Double Pear Diamond Drop Earrings
products.description: Elevate your look with beautiful precious gems from the Luxe collection. A pure example of Meliora's delicate beauty. 14kt gold with fancy cut pear shaped diamonds connect in perfect harmony.

products.name: South Sea Pearl and Pear Diamond Y Necklace
products.description: Elevate your look with beautiful precious gems from the Luxe collection.Meliora's always fashionable Y necklace in 14kt gold is adorned with a fancy cut pear shaped diamond and a stunning white South Sea pearl that drops below. Effortlessly perfect.

products.name: Cascading Pearl Earrings
products.description: Signature Meliora. 14kt gold earrings with cascading Akoya pearls. The length is very versatile from day to night. Designed on gold chain which allows a very fluid movement.

products.name: Small Ballchain and Pearl with Diamond Star Medallion Necklace
products.description: A 14kt gold small ballchain necklace. Sliding next to a freshwater pearl is a diamond star medallion. A cool modern look.

products.name: Baby Pearl Hoop Earrings with Diamonds
products.description: Cutest 14kt baby hoop earrings have Akoya pearls for beautiful color and matching size. Diamond drops add the perfect pop. The silhouette is both light and versatile.

products.name: Large Pearl and Diamond Open Ring
products.description: Modern, unique and refined. This 14kt gold, diamond and freshwater pearl ring is an iconic Mizuki piece and best seller. Incredible to stack or wear alone.

products.name: Large Pearl and Diamond Cuff
products.description: A 14kt gold cuff with minimalist simplicity. A large white freshwater drop pearl is beautifully offset by a diamond in this open cuff. Perfect for everyday and easily stacked.

products.name: Single Row Diamond Ring
products.description: Modern and refined. For everyday this 14kt gold and diamond ring is perfect.

products.name: Small Diamond Star and Pearl Earrings
products.description: Meliora's beautiful 14kt gold and diamond star earrings. Pearl tops make all the difference.

products.name: Floating Pearl Chain with Small Diamond Star Necklace
products.description: A 14kt small diamond star slides on a precious floating baby Akoya pearl adjustable chain. The charm can be removed and wear the necklace alone.

products.name: Single Row Diamond Ring
products.description: Modern and refined. For everyday this 14kt gold and diamond ring is perfect.

products.name: Freshwater Pearl Necklace
products.description: The essential pearl necklace with a 14kt gold clasp. Its uniqueness is set off by a large center pearl. Fashionable for any occasion.

products.name: Large Diamond Hoops
products.description: 14kt gold and diamond large oval hoops. Diamonds in front and back for an extra sparkle. Great alone or on an ear stack.

products.name: Diamond Heart and Pearl Bracelet
products.description: A precious diamond heart 14kt gold bracelet. An Akoya pearl creates the perfect balance and adds to its uniqueness.

products.name: Single Row and Pearl Diamond Ring
products.description: So modern, so Meliora. This 14kt gold ring perfectly balances a freshwater pearl against the single row of diamonds.

products.name: Diamond Hoops with Large Pearl Drop
products.description: Classic teardrop shaped freshwater pearl and diamond earrings. Timeless design in 14kt gold.

products.name: Centered Baby Akoya Pearl Necklace
products.description: An amazingly versatile necklace. Baby Akoya pearls float on 14kt gold chain.

products.name: Small Diamond Heart and Pearl Ring
products.description: Precious and perfect.Our's sensibilities are on full display with this 14kt yellow gold with freshwater pearl and diamond puffy heart ring. Proportion and design are everything as it wraps your finger.

products.name: Stacked Diamond and Large Pearl Solitaire Necklace
products.description: This modern solitaire 14kt gold necklace stacks the diamond on top of the large freshwater pearl. Amazing as a gift or addition to any collection.

products.name: Short Chain Pearl Drop Earrings
products.description: These 14kt gold earrings are light and fun. Akoya pearls wrapped on gold chain are perfect for the everyday. Studs can be worn separately.

products.name: Diamond Pear and Floating Pearl Bracelet
products.description: A beautiful pear diamond drops from a 14kt gold chain where Akoya pearls are stationed just slightly apart to give a floating impression.

products.name: Medium Kissing Double Pearl Studs
products.description: Taking the size up a notch. Meliora's eye for balance and scale are present in these simple and very wearable studs. Perfect 14kt gold pearl earrings.

products.name: Lariat Dancing Pearl with Gold Accent Necklace
products.description: Another Meliora staple, the lariat. Wrapped around the neck in multiple styles gives so many options. 14kt gold beads add a touch of sparkle exactly where needed.

products.name: Small Diamond Star and Pearl Ring
products.description: Precious and perfect.Proportion and design are everything as it wraps your finger.

products.name: Dual Cascading Pearl Necklace
products.description: Dual cascading Akoya pearls grace opposite sides of the body. Pearls perfectly float on a 14kt gold chain which gives amazing movement. Timeless and fashionable for any occasion.

products.name: Large Open Marquis Hoop Pearl Earrings
products.description: Best seller with white cultured pearls. Large 14kt gold earrings show off the subtle line of white cultured pearls. Mizuki's sense of balance and scale is perfectly showcased.

products.name: Three Strand Dancing Pearl Bracelet
products.description: Three strands of baby freshwater pearls strung together with a 14kt gold clasp. Our's 'dancing pearls' great alone or in a stack.

products.name: Kissing Double Pearl Safety Pin Earrings
products.description: These 14kt small safety pin earrings are cool and fashionable. Kissing Double Akoya pearls create a unique look.

products.name: Small Diamond Cluster Necklace
products.description: A beautiful organic cluster of diamonds for a precious necklace in 14kt gold.

products.name: Open Multi Diamond and Baroque White Pearl Ring
products.description: Beautiful ring combining movement, diamonds and the luster of a white baroque pearl. The diamonds descend and curve up your finger on the 14 karat gold band. Its striking and a conversation piece. Full size only.

products.name: Multi Pearl Drop Necklace
products.description: Drop shaped Akoya pearls drop from the 14kt gold chain. They effortlessly move as you do. Perfect for any outfit.

products.name: Long Dancing Pearl and Gold Accent Earrings
products.description: These long 14kt gold with freshwater 'dancing' pearls are light and striking. Layer or wear alone.

products.name: Small Diamond Star and Pearl Cuff
products.description: 4kt gold wraps your wrist balanced with a freshwater pearl and diamond star. Great alone or for layering.

products.name: Marquis with Baroque White Pearl Earrings
products.description: This original Meliora design takes 14 karat gold wire and transforms it into an open marquis shape. With large baroque white freshwater pearls at the ends, they intertwine naturalism and modernism perfectly.

products.name: Diamond Heart and Pearl Bracelet
products.description: A precious diamond heart 14kt gold bracelet. An Akoya pearl creates the perfect balance and adds to its uniqueness.

products.name: South Sea Pearl and Multi Pear Diamond Y Necklace
products.description: Elevate your look with beautiful precious gems from the Luxe collection. Mizuki's stunning long Y necklace in 14kt gold is adorned with multi fancy cut pear shaped diamonds with a gorgeous white South Sea pearl that drops below. Modern pearl sensuality at its best.

products.name: Floating Baby Pearl Bracelet
products.description: Baby Akoya pearls centered float on a 14kt chain. Beautifully modern.

products.name: Open Diamond and Small White Pearl Ring
products.description: Beautiful 14kt gold ring combines a diamond and the luster of a white pearl. Full size only.

products.name: Long Single Side Cascading Pearl Necklace
products.description: Where asymmetry meets drama and purpose. Fashionable and striking, this 14kt gold necklace will not let you down. On one side Akoya pearls cascade and float on a gold chain for ease of movement. Layer or wear alone, you can't go wrong.

products.name: Medium Diamond Star and Pearl Earrings
products.description: Beautiful 14kt gold and diamond star earrings are a step up in size. Pearl tops make all the difference.

blog.name: Boyunbağı necə qatlanır?
blog.answer1: Sonrakı nə olursa olsun, görünüşünüzün qalan hissəsi üçün lövbər rolunu oynayacaq parça.
blog.answer2: İstər qoşa zəncirli, istərsə də cazibədar choker ilə təfərrüat əlavə edərək hər şeyi bir pillə qaldırın.
blog.answer3: Gözləri çəkmək və diqqəti cəlb etmək üçün kulon və ya cazibə əlavə edərək görünüşü tamamlayın.
blog.answer4: Rəng əlavə edin, bir neçə mirvari və muncuq atın və ya bir neçə minimalist zəncirlə yenidən düzəldin. Özünü ifadə etməyi müdafiə edən zərgərlik əşyaları ilə istədiyiniz şəkildə qatlayın.
blog.full: Melioranın boyunbağının qatlanmasına dair bələdçisinə xoş gəlmisiniz, burada yaşadığımız əsas məsləhətləri bölüşürük.Heç düşünmüsünüz ki, neçə laylı boyunbağı çox olur və ya laylı ideyalar axtarırsınız? Çaxnaşma, layinq mütəxəssisi olmağın vaxtıdır.

blog.answer3: Gözləri çəkmək və diqqəti cəlb etmək üçün kulon və ya cazibə əlavə edərək görünüşü tamamlayın.
blog.answer4: Rəng əlavə edin, bir neçə mirvari və muncuq atın və ya bir neçə minimalist zəncirlə yenidən düzəldin. Özünü ifadə etməyi müdafiə edən zərgərlik əşyaları ilə istədiyiniz şəkildə qatlayın.
blog.full: Melioranın boyunbağının qatlanmasına dair bələdçisinə xoş gəlmisiniz, burada yaşadığımız əsas məsləhətləri bölüşürük.Heç düşünmüsünüz ki, neçə laylı boyunbağı çox olur və ya laylı ideyalar axtarırsınız? Çaxnaşma, layinq mütəxəssisi olmağın vaxtıdır.
